edu.cmu.tetrad.search.kernel

Class KernelGaussian

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.tetrad.search.kernel.KernelGaussian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Kernel

    public final class KernelGaussian
extends Object
implements Kernel
    Gaussian kernel for a given bandwidth. Default bandwidth is set using the median distance heuristic.
    Author:
    Robert Tillman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KernelGaussian(DataSet dataset, Node node)
      Creates a new Gaussian kernel using the median distance between points to set the bandwidth
      KernelGaussian(double sigma)
      Creates a new Gaussian kernel with the given bandwidth

      Default setting of bandwidth based on median distance heuristic
      void setMedianBandwidth(DataSet dataset, Node node)
